item.title: 泰国禁止从焚烧过的田地中生产动物饲料玉米的重大转变
item.description: 泰国将禁止进口由农业焚烧产生的动物饲料玉米，此举应有助于遏制日益恶化的跨境污染问题，同时为从美国采购铺平道路。【原文：Thailand will ban imports of animal-feed corn produced from agricultural burning, a move that should help curb a worsening cross-border pollution issue while paving the way for purchases from the US.】

item.title: 南非计划收紧其庞大回购市场的规则
item.description: 南非金融监管机构正计划对用于证券交易的资产设定最高限额，以寻求对数十亿美元的市场进行统一监管。【原文：South Africa’s financial regulator is planning to set maximum limits on the assets used for securities trading as it seeks a unified approach to oversight of a multi-billion dollar market.】

item.title: 众议院中国问题小组敦促就关税合规问题对 Anker 进行调查
item.description: 众议院中国委员会的最高级别立法者呼吁商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克调查中国电子产品和手机配件制造商 Anker Innovations Technology Co.【原文：The top lawmakers on the House China committee called on Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick to investigate Chinese electronics and phone accessory manufacturer Anker Innovations Technology Co. for what they called unfair pricing and possible illegal evasion of US tariffs.】

item.title: 巴菲特抛售全部股份后，比亚迪股价下跌
item.description: 周一，比亚迪股份有限公司股价在香港下跌，原因是有报道称巴菲特的投资公司已出售其在这家中国电动汽车制造商所持有的全部股份，这令投资者情绪低落。【原文：Shares of BYD Co. slid in Hong Kong on Monday as a report stating that Warren Buffett’s investment firm has sold all its stake in the Chinese electric-vehicle maker soured investor sentiment.】

item.title: 瑞银评估潜在澳元 AT1 票据需求
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）发表声明称，已就发行以澳元计价的股权转换附加一级债券的计划向投资者征求意见。【原文：UBS Group AG has sounded out investors on a plan to issue Australian dollar-denominated equity conversion Additional Tier 1 bonds, according to a statement from the bank.】

item.title: 瑞士就取消 21 亿美元财产税举行投票
item.description: 这个欧洲住房拥有率最低的国家即将决定是否向少数拥有房产的幸运儿赠送 17 亿法郎（21 亿美元）的税收礼物。【原文：The country with the lowest home ownership in Europe is about to decide whether to hand the lucky few with property a 1.7 billion-franc ($2.1 billion) tax gift.】

item.title: 法国正取代意大利成为欧洲财政困境的代言人
item.description: 法国长期的政治危机已使该国成为欧元区的财政热点，取代了长期以来由意大利扮演的角色。【原文：France’s prolonged political crisis has turned the country into the euro area’s fiscal flash-point, taking over a role long played by Italy.】

item.title: 巴菲特增持三井物产股份押注日本贸易公司
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc. has become a major shareholder of Mitsui & Co. after raising its stake, the latest bet that Japan’s trading houses will remain attractive.】

item.title: 中国央行在长假前重启流动性工具
item.description: 中国央行重启了八个月前最后一次使用的流动性工具，这是在黄金周公共假期前让银行系统充斥现金的举措之一。【原文：China’s central bank has dusted off a liquidity instrument it last used eight months ago, part of a move to flood the banking system with cash before the Golden Week public holiday.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为印度是 "亮点"，尽管面临关税问题
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）亚太区高管 Sjoerd Leenart 认为，印度凭借其强劲的国内增长和对出口的有限依赖，在充满挑战的全球经济格局中脱颖而出，成为一个 "亮点"。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. sees India standing out as a “bright spot” in a challenging global economic landscape, thanks to its robust domestic growth and limited reliance on exports, according to Sjoerd Leenart, the bank’s top executive for Asia Pacific.】

item.title: 奇瑞汽车据称将在香港首次公开募股定价区间的高端定价
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由于市场对奇瑞汽车的需求强劲，奇瑞汽车公司将以市场定价区间的高端定价在香港首次公开发行股票。【原文：Chery Automobile Co. is set to price its Hong Kong initial public offering at the high end of a marketed range after strong demand for the stock, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 对冲基金与资产经理就日元走向发生冲突
item.description: 对冲基金押注日元将进一步走软，而资产经理们则坚持看涨立场，这加剧了关于日本货币走向的争论。【原文：Hedge funds are betting on ever more weakness in the yen just as asset managers cling to bullish positions, augmenting the tussle on where Japan’s currency is headed.】

item.title: 全球基金减持中国债券至2021年以来最低点
item.description: 海外基金在 8 月份抛售了中国主权债券，持仓量降至近五年来的最低点，给已经因投资者转而投资股票而陷入困境的债务市场带来了压力。【原文：Overseas funds offloaded Chinese sovereign bonds in August, cutting holdings to the lowest in almost five years and piling pressure on a debt market already reeling from a shift by investors into stocks.】

item.title: H-1B 签证费上调后印度 IT 股将迎来更多颠簸
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 印尼铜矿停产，铜价保持涨势
item.description: 铜保持了上一交易日的涨势，因为交易商在权衡印尼发生的一起事故对全球供应的影响，该事故导致世界第二大矿山停产两周。【原文：Copper held gains from the previous session, as traders weighed the impact on global supplies from an accident in Indonesia that’s left the world’s second-largest mine suspended for two weeks.】

item.title: 新世界为濒临倒闭的香港机场大型购物中心寻求减租
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：New World Development Co. is in talks with Hong Kong’s Airport Authority about reducing rental obligations at its flagship 11 Skies mall, according to people familiar with the matter, as the debt-laden Hong Kong developer seeks to ease a liquidity crunch that’s pushed it to the brink.】

item.title: 日本自民党领袖之争拉开帷幕，五人角逐领袖宝座
item.description: 日本执政党领导人竞选周一在市场的密切关注下正式拉开帷幕，竞选结果很可能决定在首相石破茂决定下台后由谁来领导国家。【原文：Japan’s ruling party leadership race formally kicked off Monday under close market scrutiny, with the outcome likely to determine who will lead the nation following Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s decision to step down.】

item.title: 刚果提出出口配额计划，中国钴价下跌
item.description: 在刚果民主共和国周末宣布计划以出口配额取代长达数月的原材料运输禁令之后，中国的钴价走低。【原文：Cobalt prices edged lower in China after the Democratic Republic of Congo announced plans at the weekend to replace a months-long ban on shipments of the raw material with export quotas.】

item.title: 印度科技股或因美国修改 H-1B 签证计划而下跌
item.description: 印度科技股周一可能会下跌，因为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对新的 H-1B 签证征收高额费用可能会导致外包巨头经营困难。【原文：Indian tech stocks may decline on Monday as US President Donald Trump’s hefty fee for new H-1B visas may lead to operational difficulties for outsourcing giants.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行布洛克称近期数据略强于预期
item.description: 澳大利亚央行行长米歇尔-布洛克（Michele Bullock）表示，自8月份会议以来，经济数据一直符合或略微强于预期，经济学家预测央行将在下周维持利率不变。【原文：Australia’s central bank Governor Michele Bullock said economic data have been inline or slightly stronger than expected since the August meeting as economists predict the board will hold interest rates next week.】

item.title: 受英伟达批准报告影响，三星股价升至年内新高
item.description: 据报道，三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. shares jumped more than 5% after reports it’s won approval from Nvidia Corp. for the use of advanced memory chips, which marks a breakthrough for the Korean technology leader.】

item.title: 中国对欧盟的磁铁出口激增，欧盟集团在紧缩中首当其冲
item.description: 8 月份，中国对欧盟的稀土磁铁出口量激增，凸显出与美国相比，欧盟对中国供应的依赖程度更高，也更容易受到华盛顿和北京之间贸易紧张局势的影响。【原文：China’s exports of rare-earth magnets to the European Union surged in August, underscoring the bloc’s heavier reliance on Chinese supply compared with the US and its exposure to trade tensions between Washington and Beijing.】

item.title: 马来西亚将从 9 月底开始实施有针对性的汽油补贴
item.description: 马来西亚将在 9 月底之前改革该国最受欢迎的燃料补贴，此举将使外国人支付更高的油价，因为政府希望缩小预算赤字。【原文：Malaysia will reform subsidies on the country’s most popular fuel by end-September, a move that will see foreigners paying higher pump prices as the government looks to narrow its budget deficit.】

item.title: 超强台风逼近，香港机场考虑关闭 36 小时
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，香港国际机场正在权衡将所有客运航班停飞 36 小时，这是近年历史上停飞时间最长的一次，因为这个亚洲金融中心正在为多年来最强的一次超强台风做准备。【原文：Hong Kong International Airport is weighing grounding all passenger flights for 36 hours, the longest in recent history, as the Asian financial hub braces for one of its strongest super typhoons in years, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: T.罗威购买新兴市场和前沿债券，将其作为良性循环中的资产类别
item.description: T.上周，罗威国际集团（T Rowe Price Group Inc.【原文：T. Rowe Price Group Inc. raised its exposure to bonds in emerging and frontier markets last week, betting that their relatively higher yields will attract global funds seeking to diversify away from the US.】

item.title: 新加坡电信面临 Optus 的又一次危机，网络出现致命故障
item.description: 新加坡电信有限公司（Singapore Telecommunications Ltd.）在政府开始调查导致多人死亡的紧急电话中断事件后，其澳大利亚分部 Optus 又面临新的危机。【原文：Singapore Telecommunications Ltd. faces a fresh crisis at its Australian division Optus after the government started an investigation into an emergency call outage that resulted in multiple deaths.】

item.title: 韩国早期出口受美国关税影响表现疲软
item.description: 由于美国提高关税，韩国 9 月份的早期出口大幅下滑，这对依赖贸易的韩国经济来说是一个令人担忧的信号。【原文：South Korea’s early exports tumbled in September, with higher US tariffs slamming the brakes on shipments in a troubling sign for the trade-dependent economy.】

item.title: 特朗普协议威胁韩元升值，美元需求将激增
item.description: 由于与美国达成的 3500 亿美元投资协议预计将在未来几年推动巨大的美元兑换需求，韩元面临压力。【原文：The South Korean won is under pressure as a $350 billion investment deal with the US is expected to drive huge dollar conversion demand in the coming years.】

item.title: 印度在轨道险些失事后计划 "保镖 "卫星
item.description: 印度正在制定一项计划，以提高其保护卫星免受攻击的能力，熟悉此事的人士说，此前在轨道上发生的一次险情凸显了其他航天器对国家安全构成的风险。【原文：India is developing a plan to improve its ability to protect satellites from attacks, people familiar with the matter said, after a near miss in orbit highlighted risks to national security posed by other spacecraft.】

item.title: 交易员等待利率路径线索，黄金维持在历史记录略低位置
item.description: 在美联储今年首次降息的提振下，黄金保持了第五周上涨，投资者期待周五公布的关键通胀数据能为美国央行的货币政策路径提供更多线索。【原文：Gold held a fifth weekly advance, boosted by the Federal Reserve’s first rate cut of the year, with investors looking to a key inflation print due Friday for more clues about the US central bank’s monetary path.】
